summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of CEX/DEX arbitrage system. All backend APIs and frontend screens tested successfully. True on-chain Solana Whirlpool price parsing verified ($141.91 SOL), Gemini orderbook streaming working, signal detection identifying realistic spreads (0.07%), execution simulation with correct PnL calculations, all 6 UI screens rendering correctly with proper navigation, timestamps in ET format, and real-time WebSocket updates functioning.

backend_issues.notes: All backend endpoints working correctly. System is intentionally PAUSED due to daily loss limit from test trades - this is correct risk management behavior, not a bug.

frontend_issues.notes: All 6 screens render correctly. Dark theme with lime accents properly implemented. Status pills showing correct connection states. OBSERVE_ONLY mode indicator visible as expected.

passed_tests: Backend: System status endpoint (200 OK)
Backend: Gemini CEX connection (Connected)
Backend: Solana DEX connection (Connected, true on-chain data)
Backend: On-chain Whirlpool price parsing at offset 65 with Q64.64 conversion ($141.91 SOL)
Backend: Opportunities endpoint with spread column (100 opportunities)
Backend: Trades endpoint with correct PnL calculations (100 trades)
Backend: Realistic slippage simulation (0.05-0.15%)
Backend: Realistic fee calculations (~0.6%)
Backend: Pause/Resume controls
Backend: Opportunity injection and execution pipeline
Frontend: Overview screen loads with 4 KPI cards
Frontend: Opportunities screen with spread column
Frontend: Trades screen with CSV export button
Frontend: Execution Monitor with timeline and details
Frontend: Inventory screen with balance tracking
Frontend: Risk & Limits screen with kill switches
Frontend: Navigation between all 6 screens
Frontend: Status pills (Gemini: Connected, Solana: Connected, Coinbase: Degraded)
Frontend: Timestamps in ET format
Frontend: WebSocket real-time updates
Frontend: No console errors detected
